description:
After a run-in with a mysterious creature at sea, Hajime and his party’s search to find Myu continues in the ruins of an ancient city. Myu is miraculously saved by Meiru Melusine just before monsters pour into the city. Hajime’s party must team up with the Liberators, here from the past and armed with the magic of the gods. Together, they must defeat the horde in the second OVA of this story.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maboroshi no Bouken to Kiseki no Kaigou P2
The Miraculous Meeting and The Phantasmagorical Adventure P2
幻の冒険と奇跡の邂逅 P2
